resources.string: Existing client but don\'t have a login?
Our team will setup your registration by the next business day and you will receive a confirmation email when your online access is ready.

A better and innovative way to invest your superannuation. The Kovac Smart Superannuation Accounts are completely transparent, individual superannuation investment accounts managed by our highly skilled and experienced investment team.

string.name: discription_text2
string.b: Benefits of a Kovac Smart Super Account

resources.string:
-100% Free superannuation assessment including a personalised, detailed Statement of Advice.
 - Ultra low adviser service fee of 0.8% per year on the balance of your superannuation fund.
 - Real time access to your superannuation portfolio, account details and more across all of your personal devices.
 - Your own personal financial adviser who will provide ongoing financial advice, strategy and support by email or phone
 - Genuinly active and high conviction investment manager, meaning potentially significant outperformance of investment portfolios.
 - Managed in accordance with our robust, disciplined and proven investment philosophy and process.
 - Diversified, transparent investment portfolio with direct superannuation ownership of investments in:
 			- Direct Australian Shares
 			- International Managed Funds
 			- Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs)
 			- Corporate Hybrid Securities
